title: Voices of Women in Kitchen community at farmers protest in Punjab-Haryana border | The Federal
selftext: As the farmers' protest enters the 14th day, let us hear it from women supporting the protesting farmers on the Punjab-Haryana border. They have been struggling to tackle the cold weather along with their kids, sheltering under tarpaulins on the roadside and finding cover to bathe and use the toilet. What drives the grit and courage?
